scope.title: Text Input
scope.description: Text inputs are input fields typically used in forms that allow the user to enter text data in a structured format.

data.description: Text inputs are input fields typically used in forms that allow the user to enter text data in a structured format.

scope.title: Text Input
scope.description: Text inputs are input fields typically used in forms that allow the user to enter text data in a structured format.
